title: 怎么给称号？
author: 小羊问mc
txt_content: 我的世界服务器可以给称号的，我忘记了，帮忙发一下！

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
小羊问mc 发表于 2014-7-2 15:48
不是有前缀和后缀么？，你少发了把！
有称号用后缀的么？
后缀是suffix

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
manuaddv <player> prefix [称号]
mangaddv <group> prefix [称号]

replies.author: 小羊问mc
replies.txt_content:
